attributes.action: allow foster children to see their blood brothers and sisters often
attributes.action_prefix: We the undersigned petition the Prime Minister to
attributes.background: I know a 14 year old girl who has been fostered and knows she has brothers and sister but social services told her she is not allowed to see them until they are all 18 or over. I think this is unfair as she always gets upset about it. There must be millions of kids out there that feel the same. Please allow this because it is very important.
